item.description:
What -
For the first time The Hunt’s Show will offer a preview night to professional photographers at its Melrose location. All special pricing and promotions will be in effect from 4pm to 8pm. In addition to the great pricing there will be factory representatives from all major brands on hand to give expert advice



Other opportunities -
Other Show hours are 10/30 Friday 10am-8pm, 10/31 Saturday 9am-6pm, and 11/1 Sunday 10am-6pm.

Also, new this year are 3 seminars tailored to professionals. Thursday night will feature author and photographer Lou Jones speaking on the advantages of using portable speedlights for creative lighting. Friday morning will feature photographer and product developer Xavier De La Paz discussing innovative studio solutions. Finally on Saturday morning join David Guy Maynard as he talks about practical solutions to on-location lighting and color management. Seating is limited and pre-registration is required. To register visit www.wbhunt.com/seminars or call (781)462-2398

Where -
Hunt's Photo and Video
100 Main Street
Melrose, MA 02176-6104

Contact -
Toll Free Phone: (800) 924-8682
Local Phone: (781)662-8822

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Hunt’s Show - Pro Preview Night
